sense.def: Pathological Condition of zheng 癥 , concretion-illness, brought forth by cold evil and stagnant blood. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry yang qi shi 陽起石：能暖女子子宮久冷，冷癥寒瘕 , “It is able to provide a uterus with warmth that has been affected by cold over a long time, with cold concretion-illness and cold conglomeration-illness”. Leng zhi 冷滯 , cold sluggish [discharge]; cold sluggishness [7]

a) zhi xia 滯下 , sluggish discharge, with the color of the discharge being mostly white. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 15: 治中結陽丸，斷冷滯，下赤白青色如魚腦，脫 肛出，積日腹痛，經時不斷者方 , “The pills that regulate the center and bind yang [qi]: they end cold sluggish discharge of a red-white-greenish color reminiscent of fish brain, with prolapse of the rectum, and abdominal pain over several days that does not end during menstruation”.

b) Of all diseases constituting a long-term stagnation in the organism of cold items such as wind, phlegm, qi, blood, and pus in the body. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 12: 胞中瘀血冷滯 , “Stagnant blood with cold sluggishness in the uterus”. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 44: 腎臟風虛冷滯 , “Kidney depot wind [intruding into a state of] depletion and cold sluggish [discharge] ”. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 50: 五膈氣脾胃冷滯 , “The five types of occlusion qi with cold sluggishness in the spleen and stomach. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 51: 心膈冷滯痰飲嘔逆 , “Cold sluggishness of phlegm rheum in the heart and diaphragm with vomiting and counterflow”. Pu ji fang 普濟方 286 refers to flesh with white pus and diminished blood as: 瘡口冷滯 , “ Cold sluggishness in the opening of sores”.
